name: Pseudodragon
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Senses
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pseudodragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The pseudodragon can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature uses an action to shake it awake.
